ss.week1.hotel

Class Guest

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.week1.hotel.Guest

  • public class Guest
extends java.lang.Object
    Hotel Guests that might have a room.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bart Verkuil & Justin Altena

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Guest(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a Guest with the given name without a room.

        Returns the Room of the Guest

      • checkin

        public boolean checkin(ss.week1.hotel.Room r)
        Assigns a room to a Guest. The room has to be empty and the guest can't have other rooms at the same time.
        Parameters:
        r -
        Returns:
        true when action succeeds, otherwise it returns false

      • checkout

        public boolean checkout()
        Removes the room from the Guests. It sets the room to 0.
        Returns:
        True when room is successfully removed. If there is no room assigned to the Guest return false.
